Summary: The [Market Trading Hours] section is displayed in English after changing any language
STR: Scroll to the [Карта активности рынков] section on the main page
Click on the any "Партнерская программа" button
Pay attention to the [Market Trading Hours] section
Expected Result: The [Market Trading Hours] section is displayed in the selected language
Actual Result: The [Market Trading Hours] section is displayed in English after changing any language
